title: Are You With Mo'Nique or Against Her
itunes:title: Are You With Mo'Nique or Against Her
description:
Monday 1/22 - Today on the show we had Amara La Negra from Love and Hip Hop Miami, where she spoke about being an afro- latina and the continuous struggle of being accepted in the Latin community and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Mo'Nique for claiming she is the most decorative comedian alive while ranting about her not getting enough money for a Netflix special. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners stand with Mo'Nique or against her.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
